purpose: The email announces a call for papers for a special issue of the Journal of Systems and Software on the topic of Intelligent DevOps for performance, sustainability, and reliability.
evidence_sentences: Call for Papers ― JSS Special Issue on “Intelligent DevOps for Performance, Sustainability, and Reliability”
This special issue aims to consolidate the latest research and advancements on the topic of Intelligent DevOps for performance, sustainability, and reliability.
